title: Are Steve Harvey and Tommy are Equals? 03.30.17
itunes:title: Are Steve Harvey and Tommy are Equals? 03.30.17
description:
The crew talks the controversy surrounding Bill O'Reilly and his comments on Maxine Waters hair. Tommy thinks he is equal to Steve.
